title: how to capture your nocturnal narrative on the galaxy s22 ultra

components.copy: How to capture your nocturnal narrative on the Galaxy S22 Ultra

text: Want to level up your filmmaking skills with the S22 Ultra’s nightography features? Watch as Will Robson-Scott and our Samsung KX expert gives us insider knowledge on how to utilise your S22 device and capture your own unique perspective - even if you’re not an expert videographer or photographer!

components.title: How to capture your nocturnal narrative on the Galaxy S22 Ultra
